attributes.title: Beawar Pali Pindwara Tollway Pvt. Ltd. 1
attributes.desc: Beawar – Pali – Pindwara Road in Rajasthan is the longest four-lane road project developed through the Public Private Partnership (PPP) model in the National Highways sector. L&T IDPL completed this project with commercial operations (tolling) commencing on June 11, 2015. The final COD was awarded on February 16, 2023, under IndInfravit.
